MemoryInfobox.description: 'After her investigations into the problem plaguing Thasos, Kassandra decided to return to Mikkos to tell him what was going on.'
MemoryInfobox.concurrent:
Doctor's Pet
Indulging Just a Little
School of Hard Knocks

General_Description: '''Have You Seen My Mikkos?''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra helped [[Mikkos]] to investigate problems plaguing [[Thasos]] and [[Neleus]] alike.
Section_Dialogue: This quest consists of the three support quests [[Doctor's Pet]], [[Indulging Just a Little]], and [[School of Hard Knocks]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra set out to find the [[doctor]] at the [[Aliki Quarry]] in order to get the antidote.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
